data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chen, Hua-yan, Turrisi, Giuseppe Fabrizio, Xu, Zai-fu (2016): A revision of the Chinese Aulacidae (Hymenoptera, Evanioidea). ZooKeys 587: 77-124, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.587.7207, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.587.7207
